data.title: The Trusts Arena on LinkedIn: Meet The Trusts Arena Team! Originally hailing from the UK, Martin Avard…
data.meta_description:
Meet The Trusts Arena Team!

Originally hailing from the UK, Martin Avard has over 17 years of Event and Department Management experience from London to New…
data.text:
Last month we asked you about how you / your company organise company events. 67% of you said you organise your own team events in house. For those 67%, do you have a dedicated in-house events team or is it a voluntary role that certain staff members take on? What kind of events do you organise? Comment below and let us know! #eventsindustry #corporateevents #eventmanagement #eventplanning #eventservices

Did you know?: Corporate Events Market Will Quintuple This Decade The U.S. corporate event market size was valued at $95.3 billion in 2020, and is estimated to reach $510.9 billion by 2030, registering a CAGR of 17.3% from 2021 to 2030. What does this mean for your company? 1- If you are already planning corporate events now, you probably will be hosting more in the future. 2- If you aren't planning corporate events now, your competitors probably are. 3- It's time to REACH out to us today to discuss your corporate events strategy, and how quality corporate events planning can set your company up for long term success.

If you're looking to plan a corporate event and need a partner to help craft and execute an amazing experience, check out Whoa Events. Christina O. and her team personalize every detail and alleviate any stress in the event planning process. Learn more about their past events at https://lnkd.in/evSTTxz or reach out to Christina O. directly for more information or a consultation. #corporateevents #eventplanning #eventmanagement

The Benefits of Group Transportation Services for Corporate Events Organising a corporate event involves many moving parts, with transportation being a crucial but often challenging aspect to manage. Group transportation services emerge as a practical and efficient solution, offering a range of benefits that can significantly enhance the experience of your corporate event. Here’s an in-depth look at how these services can transform your next event. Read More: https://lnnk.in/bJjY #bushire #coachhire
